helpSteps.content: Browse the data via investigations
Browse the data via proposals
Browse the data via instruments and facility cycles
Browse the data via instruments and studies
View your own data
View your own data
This shows your navigation steps and you can click on each step to go back
The number of results found taking into account any applied filters is displayed here
Navigate to search
Displays the current number of items in the selection and you can click here to navigate to download
Switch between table and card view
Select a role to filter your data by your role on experiments
Click here to remove all filters currently applied to columns
Click here to expand the filters
Enter text here to filter within this column. You can click on the cog to make the filter inclusive or exclusive
The results can be sorted in ascending or descending order by clicking the column name
Navigate between different pages of results here
Use this dropdown to change the number of results displayed per page
This area displays the data
You can select investigations, datasets or datafiles by clicking here
You can view detailed information by clicking here
Click on this button to download this specific item
Here you can format the citation for this data. Use the dropdown to select the citation format and click the button to copy the citation
